Attacking the opponent with torrents of water initially, Mei finishes them off using Lava Release, spitting a small high force shot of lava from her mouth at a high speed.

== Trivia ==
* The last part of this technique's name may be a pun, as it is one kanji short of {{translation|[[wikipedia:rhyolite|rhyolite]]|"流紋岩"|ryūmongan}}, a type of volcanic rock.
